mapper.select: SELECT count (*) FROM REVIEW r ,ORDERMENU o,MENU m,COMPANY c WHERE o.IDX =r."REF" AND m.NAME = o.NAME AND c.IDX = m."REF" AND c.IDX =#{idx} order by r.idx desc
select * from review order by idx desc
SELECT r.* FROM REVIEW r ,ORDERMENU o WHERE r.ref =o.IDX and r.ref=#{idx}
SELECT r.* ,m.NAME FROM REVIEW r ,ORDERMENU o,MENU m,COMPANY c WHERE o.IDX =r."REF" AND m.NAME = o.NAME AND c.IDX = m."REF" AND c.IDX =#{idx} order by r.idx desc
mapper.update: update review set content=#{content}, score=#{score}, regDate2=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') where idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT nvl(round(avg(r.score),2),0) rank FROM REVIEW r ,ORDERMENU o ,MENU m ,COMPANY c WHERE r."REF" = o.IDX AND o.NAME = m.NAME AND m."REF" = c.IDX AND c.IDX = #{idx}
select distinct(c.idx) from review r,menu m,company c,ordermenu o where r.ref=o.idx and o.name = m.name and m.ref=c.idx and r.ref=#{idx}
